Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I can give you what you want.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another agent. How interesting.'}
{3: "But Roland isn't surprised at all."}
{3: "This gold-masked agent wouldn't spend so much time and effort to invite him for a coffee."}
{3: 'Still, the offer was very cliche. "What is this, a villain in some cult B-rated superhero movie"? Roland thinks.'}
{3: 'But this man named Vonnegut... is looking at him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "You don't look too satisfied.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "You either think I'm a fool, or... you prefer to seize the thing you want with your own hands.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Is there a difference?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'No. Or, should I say, they are equally interesting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "I'll go with the former if you can't give me a reason in your next five sentences.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: '"Miss Luna". Is that enough?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Eureka, Roland thinks.'}
{3: 'The question now is how to get the information from him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Right now, you are probably thinking about how to get that information from me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Isn't that the standard procedure?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'You know it yourself.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Are you going to let me do that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'It depends on whether you accept my offer or not.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man named Vonnegut gives Roland a meaningful look.'}
{3: "He does not seem to be in a rush for answers, but Roland cannot rule out the possibility that he won't be able to leave alive without a concrete answer."}
{3: 'Roland is pretty sure that if they want to keep him here, they are most likely able to.'}
{3: "That Cinderelik girl's power alone shocks him. Roland has never thought the power of Ascendants can be used in that way."}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Think about it. I know what you are pursuing. Even though I may not agree with you... but I will help you find it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: '"Find" is probably not a good word... But one day, you will get to see it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'As long as you provide reasonable assistance to what I want to do. Of course, I promise I will put your talent to good use.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1901_3.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'My former "colleague" might have a different opinion.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Too bad he cannot express this himself, so I'll do this on his behalf.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What do you think? Mr. "Vonnegut"?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "He's gone silent. This is good."}
{3: 'As long as...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'What do you think of this former colleague of yours?', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 3: 'Dammit, he throws the question back.'}
{3: 'Gabriel... Roland had no comment for him ever since the Polyphage incident.'}
{3: 'He only brought him up to make the guy in front embarrassed.'}
{3: "If that's the case..."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "He's a useless piece of junk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I know he died. A well-deserved death, I would say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'That was as far as he could ever reach.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "If you know what I want, you shouldn't be surprised at what I said.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'In that case, you should already have an answer.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'What if I say no?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Are you turning Mr. Vonnegut down?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Roland realizes, Cinderelik is already standing behind him.'}
{3: 'She is playing with a Jitterbomb. Her fingers are gently rubbing its belly, making its antennae tremble.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'What? Are you all too scared to say no to him?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Not really.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'But those who did all ended up proving that Mister was right when they lay six feet underground.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'They only chose the future they deserved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'And I had no right to stop them from doing that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'The same applies to you, Roland.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Roland did not reply. He just stares at Vonnegut, waiting for him to continue.'}
{3: 'Just like what he has been doing all this time.'}
{3: "Roland has no need to disclose his real purpose, or to worry about Vonnegut's true intention."}
{3: 'If this agent throws him an offer, all he has to do is to repeat what he did before.'}
{3: '"What exactly do you want?" Roland is waiting for Vonnegut to tell him what he wants from him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "To make it simple, I'd like to watch you pursue your own future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I will therefore make your wishes come true, provided that you give me something of equal value in return.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Then you only need to choose between "my future" and "your future."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "A very good deal, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Right, a very good deal. Too good to be true.'}
{3: 'Even now, this man has not revealed what Roland wants to know most.'}
{3: 'People have their desires. So do Ascendants.'}
{3: 'Just like Luna, this guy has extremely strong desires.'}
{3: 'Roland knows it very well, and he begins to fear the desire that Vonnegut is yet to reveal.'}
{3: '—Perhaps this is exactly what Vonnegut wants him to feel.'}
{3: 'Is that so? Keeping your card to make me fear?'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Very good. But what do you want from me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I don't think you are a philanthropist. I mean, you are keeping such a formidable sidekick.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland tilts his head at Cinderelik, who is standing behind him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Mister is not a philanthropist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'We had a very fair deal.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'So, what did he ask from you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'I need knowledge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Mister will take away the by-products from my experiments.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'A very reasonable deal.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cinderelik', 3: 'Exactly.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "That's enough business talk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'm not in the mood to appreciate your teacher-student relationship.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Anyway, it's time to make up your mind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I sent Cinderelik to pick you up because of what you said to Voodoo.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I trust you have seen enough now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Make your choice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Then accept all the things you deserve.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What shall I do?'}
{3: "Roland isn't in fear or lost. He is not going with the flow, nor is he struggling."}
{3: 'This man in front of him is definitely offering him an opportunity.'}
{3: 'But he does not know whether this gift box will bring him light or maggot when opened.'}
{3: 'All he knows is the gift of destiny awaits.'}
{3: "What is it? What's behind this gift?"}
{3: 'Does it matter? Or not?'}
{3: "Enlighten me, hermano. It's been quite some time since you last showed up."}
{3: 'Why are you not showing up? Do you think I am capable of making decisions now? Or have you given up on me?'}
{3: 'Roland feels his invisible nerves are getting tense. His eyes are getting dry.'}
{3: 'The Construct body no longer has the function, but he feels like he is sweating at the back of his neck.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2001_12.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Use your brain and think—who on earth are you?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "An actor? A knight? A stray dog? An Ascendant? Luna's loyal servant?"}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Stop lying to yourself.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'You are just who you are.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "You aren't anyone else. You aren't an item. You are just yourself, the one and only you in this world."}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Go onward, and one day you will be able to answer me—who are you?'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Your ideals, your recognition, your violence, your cunning.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Maybe you need someone to rely on, some belief to follow, or a mission to give you a reason to live on.'}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: "But you are unique. There's no one else like you in this world."}
{2: 'Roland?', 3: 'Go, my puppy. Use them, get what you want, and tear them apart—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Hmph. I see.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "It's actually... very simple."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Alright. I'm going to be frank and list my price.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "You probably can't say no, can you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland feels he can finally smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'There is no such thing as destiny in this world. Heaven or hell does not exist either.'}
{3: 'The so-called "destiny" is one\'s own choice. It is their own path taken, the blood spilled on their own hands, the words they acknowledge.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2001_11.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Well, amaze me. Show me what's inside Santa's chocolate box—"}
{3: 'Roland looks at the gold-masked man. He no longer hates the pressure from him.'}
{3: 'From now on, everything will be his token. He will play them, use them, and sacrifice them.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Well then, tell me what you want—'}
{3: 'Of course, stronger tokens are more desirable.'}
{3: 'These people in front of him make perfect tokens. Roland can send them to hell without hesitation.'}
{3: 'How will the world become when Luna returns?'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I want power. Yours, and mine.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Of course I will give you your power. What about mine?'}
{3: 'There is no need to think.'}
{3: 'Roland feels the familiar yet strange world disappear around him. He sees a tight rope connecting him and fate.'}
{3: 'Too easy. The choice is too easy.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I hope you can lend me a hand when I'm in need, Sir."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "You won't lose anything."}
{3: "Roland sees a trace of surprise in Vonnegut's eyes. He didn't expect such a request."}
{3: 'Out of the corner of his eye, Roland sees Cinderelik open her mouth, but Vonnegut dismisses her attempt.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'An interesting request. I cannot give you a guarantee, but you can look forward to it.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory274.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Luna\'s initial wish was to create a "paradise she could live together with her sister."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'But as long as the Ascnet has a leash on her, Luna will never get what she really wants.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2001_11.jpg'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I'll take it as a yes."}
{3: 'Too easy. Way too easy. Roland knows he will still be walking the tightrope in the days to come, but he will never say no to it.'}
{3: 'Who cares about how much fate will ask for what it bestows?'}
{3: 'Roland finally understands what "result" means. He can now think beyond the orders and requests given to him.'}
{3: 'When the price he asks is significantly higher than his value, his life no longer matters compared with the possibility of finding an "answer."'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Well then, welcome.'}
{3: 'With an everlasting indecipherable look, the man named Vonnegut reaches out a hand.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'With a smirk of an epiphany, Roland goes to his unknown destiny.'}
